channel.title: Life on very cool blog
channel.description: Recent content in Life on very cool blog

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hello, my name is Edvard Tome, which you can probably tell by this site url. I’m a computer science student studying in DCU and I absolutely love my life. This is my first ever personal blog page, so it might look a bit messy but it functions. Will be uploading a mix of general life updates and grind stuff. (You can look at what tags i’ve uploaded to by clicking/pressing on the menu at the top left.)
